content.title: Almost
content.description:
Near the summit. Gubbi glides between trees — fully blue, almost glowing. Gunda is running.

He rounds a bend and almost collides with Arjun, coming from the shortcut path. Both stop, breathing hard. Arjun looks at Gubbi's wings. "You actually made it," he says — genuine. They stand at the summit entrance together. "Together?" Gunda asks. Arjun shrugs. "After you."

content.question: Gunda hears Ajji's voice in the wind! ಅಂ is called Anusvara. What does 'ಅಂಗಡಿ' mean?
What do we call 'sky' in Kannada? (Hint: it has ಅಂ in it!)

screens.content: Great! You learned the Anusvara ಅಂ! Gubbi's feathers glow brighter than ever — the summit is right there!
